General.Name: Advance United Holdings Inc
General.Description: Advance United Holdings Inc. engages in acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It primarily explores for gold. The Company's principal property is Doyle Property comprising 109 cell mining claims covering an area of 3,265 hectares located in Runnalls Township. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 372 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2W9
